org.fudgemsg
Class UTF8

java.lang.Object
  org.fudgemsg.UTF8
Deprecated. 

@Deprecated
public class UTF8
extends java.lang.Object

Support for normal UTF-8 instead of the modified UTF-8 encoding used in the earlier versions of the specification. Implemented from information at en.wikipedia.org/wiki/UTF-8, and other methods from ModifiedUTF8Util. Note that this has deprecated on it in a deliberately misleading fashion - it's the ModifiedUTF8Util one that should be; not this.

Encodes a string into a supplied array. The array must be at least getLengthBytes(String) long for this to succeed.

readString

public static java.lang.String readString(java.io.DataInput is,
                                          int utfLen)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
Deprecated. 
Decodes a string from a DataInput source. Note that the methods within DataInput are designed for modified UTF-8 so can't be used directly with Fudge.

Parameters:
is - data source
utfLen - number of bytes of data to read
Returns:
the decoded string
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if the underlying source raises one or the data is malformed

writeString

                              java.lang.String str)
                       throws java.io.IOException
Deprecated. 
Encodes a string to a DataOutput target. Note that the methods within DataOutput are designed for modified UTF-8 so can't be used directly with Fudge.

Parameters:
os - data target
str - string to encode
Returns:
number of bytes written
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if the target raises one
